titleStmt.title: Love-letters between a noble-man and his sister
titleStmt.author: Behn, Aphra, 1640-1689.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and are to be sold by Randal Taylor ...,

notesStmt.note: Vol. [2] has imprint: London: Printed for the author, 1685.
Vol. [3] has title: The amours of Philander and Silvia. 1687.
Dedications of vols. [2] and [3] signed: A.B.
Imaginary letters between Forde Grey, Earl of Tankerville, and his sister-in-law, Lady Henrietta Berkeley, but in reality written by Aphra Behn. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
